title: Amelia Maylock Kindle Box-Set
description: The Amelia Maylock series;Book 1; The 12th year awakening.Book 2; Hidden in the Amethyst.Book 3; Ysmirao & the pearl of time.Now, all the above books in the series are available in a box set.Follow Amelia Maylock's early adventures ... magic, adventure ... danger!All the books so far in the series are also available individually for the Kindle, and in paperback; The 12th year awakening, Hidden in the Amethyst, Ysmirao & the pearl of time, and book 4 - the Jade treasure of shadows.
author: Jason  Ellis
